name: Ethereum
problem: Enables decentralized applications and smart contracts without intermediaries.
risks: High gas fees, smart contract vulnerabilities, scams.
simple: Ethereum is like a global computer that anyone can use to run apps without a central owner.

name: Solana
problem: Fast and low-cost blockchain for decentralized apps.
simple: Solana is a very fast blockchain where apps can run cheaply.

name: Cosmos
problem: Connects multiple blockchains into one ecosystem.
simple: Cosmos acts like an 'internet of blockchains' so they can talk to each other.

name: Polkadot
problem: Allows blockchains to interoperate and share security.
simple: Polkadot lets different blockchains work together safely.

name: Avalanche
simple: Avalanche is a fast blockchain where apps can run quickly and cheaply.

name: Chainlink
problem: Connects smart contracts to real-world data (oracles).
risks: Data source reliability, smart contract risk
simple: Chainlink is like a bridge between blockchains and real-world data.

name: Uniswap
problem: Decentralized exchange for swapping tokens without intermediaries.
simple: Uniswap lets people trade tokens directly without a bank or exchange.

name: Decentraland
problem: A virtual world where users can buy, sell, and build on land using blockchain.
simple: Decentraland is like a virtual 3D world on the blockchain where you can own land and items.
